class.name: G4MFMaterialChannel4D
class.brief_description: Represents a single channel of a G4MF material, such as the base color, normal map, or emission properties.
class.description: G4MFMaterialChannel4D is a class for material channels inside of a [G4MFMaterial4D]. A material channel is a single property of a material, such as [member G4MFMaterial4D.base_color_channel], [member G4MFMaterial4D.normal_channel], [member G4MFMaterial4D.emissive_channel], and [member G4MFMaterial4D.orm_channel]. The colors in a material channel may represent actual colors, or may be more abstract data, such as a normal map's color values encoding the normal vectors of a surface.

method.name: from_dictionary
method.description: Converts the given [Dictionary] representing the JSON of a G4MF material channel to a [G4MFMaterialChannel4D]. This will set the fields of the [G4MFMaterialChannel4D] and [G4MFItem4D] classes based on the data in the [Dictionary].

method.name: is_equal_exact
method.description: Checks if the [G4MFMaterialChannel4D] is equal to another [G4MFMaterialChannel4D] exactly by checking if the properties are equal and all accessor indices refer to the same accessors. If a material channel refers to a different accessor, even if the data is the same, this will return [code]false[/code]. The name of the material channel is not checked, and any metadata is ignored.

method.name: to_dictionary
method.description: Converts the G4MF material channel to a [Dictionary]. This is used for serializing the G4MF material channel as JSON.

members.member: The binding that defines per-item values (such as colors), and indices which map these to elements, for this material channel. If not defined, the surface uses only the [member factor] and/or the mapped texture for its values or colors.

The modulate factor of the surface, also known as the value or single base color. If non-negative, this is per-component multiplied with other properties to get the final color of the cells and edges, or if no other properties are defined, this is the only color used.

The index of the [G4MFTexture4D] in the [G4MFState4D]'s textures array that contains the texture for this surface. This is per-component multiplied with the [member single_color] and the cell colors to get the final color of the cells. If not defined, the surface does not have a texture. [b]Note:[/b] This property is currently not used when generating a [Material4D] from a [G4MFMaterial4D].
Override for the mesh surface's texture map binding. If defined, this binding is used instead of the mesh surface's [member G4MFMeshSurface4D.texture_map_binding] to map the texture onto the surface.
